resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104362</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104362</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206648</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gran Quivira: A Blending of Cultures in a Pueblo Indian Village</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gran Quivira: Ein Mischen der Kulturen in 
einem Pueblo-Inder-Dorf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gran Quivira : Se mélanger des cultures 
dans un village d'Indien de pueblo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gran Quivira: Misturar-se das culturas em 
uma vila do indian do povoado indígino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gran Quivira: Un mescolamento delle colture 
in un villaggio dell'indiano del pueblo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Gran Quivira: Ένας συνδυασμός των 
πολιτισμών σε ένα ινδικό χωριό Pueblo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gran Quivira: El mezclar de culturas en una 
aldea del indio del pueblo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">can help students understand daily life and how it changed for the Pueblo Indians of Gran Quivira, the largest of the three Salinas pueblos located in central New Mexico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dose helfen Kursteilnehmern, tägliche Lebensdauer
und wie sie für die Pueblo-Inder von Gran Quivira änderte, das 
größte der drei Salinaspueblos zu verstehen, die in zentralem 
New-Mexico gelegen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le bidon aident des étudiants à comprendre la 
vie quotidienne et comment il a changé pour les Indiens de pueblo de 
Gran Quivira, le plus grand des trois pueblos de salines situés dans 
le Nouveau-Mexique central.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a lata ajuda a estudantes compreender a vida 
diária e como mudou para os indians do povoado indígino de Gran 
Quivira, o maior dos três povoados indíginos dos salinas situados em
Novo México central.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la latta aiuta gli allievi a capire la vita 
quotidiana e come è cambiato per gli indiani del pueblo di Gran 
Quivira, il più grande dei tre pueblos delle saline situati nel Nuovo
Messico centrale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπορέστε να βοηθήσετε τους σπουδαστές να καταλάβουν 
την καθημερινή ζωή και πώς άλλαξε για το Pueblo Ινδοί Gran 
Quivira, ο μεγαλύτερος των τριών salinas pueblos που 
βρέθηκαν στο κεντρικό New Mexico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la lata ayuda a estudiantes a entender vida de 
cada día y cómo cambió para los indios del pueblo de Gran Quivira, 
el más grande de los tres pueblos de las salinas situados en New 
México central.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206648</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104362</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/gran-quivira-a-blending-of-cultures-in-a-pueblo-indian-village</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
